answers.answer: Mini strokes IN the eye are caused like strokes in the brain by the arteries being blocked of the veins clotting off. The causes are legion, just a few hypertension, glaucoma, carotid arterty disese, heart problems, many different types of eye problems, diabetes, smoking, IV illegal drugs.See an Eye MD and a Internist to get the complete lists, find your cause and try and prevent anotherJCH MD

question: What could cause a mini stroke in your eye?    No blood pressure problems known, most of the time on low side
title: failure to focus
